rooms.description: Spacious living room with Scandinavian aesthetics. Features include clean lines and natural lighting.
Dining area integrated with the living space for a seamless flow.
Modern kitchen designed in Scandinavian style featuring an open layout with sustainable materials.
Master bedroom on the ground floor for accessibility. Includes built-in closets and minimalist decor.
Attached bathroom for master bedroom with Vastu-compliant design ensuring energy flow.

openings.description: Vastu-aligned entrance facing north-east to ensure positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling windows promoting natural light and Scandinavian ambience.
Direct access from the kitchen to the central courtyard for ventilation and aesthetic appeal.

courtyard.description: Central open space designed with water features and greenery in line with Scandinavian minimalism and Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Guest bedroom with Scandinavian simplicity and functional design.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and balanced energy flow according to Vastu norms.
Shared bathroom on the first floor with modern fixtures and efficient space utilization.

openings.description: Balcony providing natural light and ventilation, aligned with Vastu recommendations.
Staircase connecting first floor to ground floor, ensuring safe and energy efficient flow.

rooms.description: Home office/study area designed with Scandinavian minimalism and optimized for natural light.
Utility area for storage and laundry, keeping the living areas clutter-free.

openings.description: Window ensuring adequate ventilation and natural light for the study area.

principles: Entrance should face north-east to invite positive energy.
Central courtyard acts as a balanced focal point for family interactions.
Open spaces are oriented to maximize natural light and air circulation.

aesthetics: Neutral color palette with accents of greenery.
Clean lines and minimalist decor throughout the space.
scandinavian_design_features.lighting: Emphasis on maximizing natural light through strategic window placement.

compliance: Adheres to Indian residential building norms for safety, accessibility, and space utilization.
Incorporates Vastu principles in layout planning.
